basic.description: An introduction to basic principles of conducting, baton and rehearsal techniques.
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Beginning Conducting Techniques

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITES    MUSC 191/6.0 and (MUSC 121/6.0 or MUSC 124/6.0) and (6.0 units from MUSC 180/3.0; MUSC 181/3.0; MUSC 183/3.0; MUSC 185/3.0; MUSC 187/3.0; MUSC 188/3.0).
